# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(input_string::String; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input_string)
    output_string = ""
    current_width = 0

    for word in words
        if current_width + length(word) > text_width
            output_string *= "\n"
            current_width = 0
        end
        output_string *= "$word "
        current_width += length(word) + 1
    end

    return output_string
end

input_string = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."
output = wrap_string(input_string, text_width=20)
println(output)
```

Example Output:
```
Lorem ipsum dolor
sit amet,
consectetur
adipiscing elit.
```
